oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Architect's sketch of Boone Dam, Eastern Tennessee near Bluff City
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Color tinted sketch of Boone Dam near Bluff City, Tennessee. Parts of the dam shown include spillway gates and a hydropower station. Features a divided back for correspondence on reverse. Postcard printed on linen. [No. K7200] Note: this is an additional copy of this postcard and is the same as 48933.
oai_dc:dc.dc:coverage: Boone Dam (Tenn.); Bluff City (Tenn.); Sullivan County (Tenn.); Washington County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Dams; Sketches
